landingPage.title: Let's unite, Ukrainians!
landingPage.body: Discover Ukrainian businesses, restaurants, cultural center and community hubs across Europe. Whether you're looking for a familiar place, a taste of home, feeling of unity or ways to support own people abroad - this map helps you to find and contribute to the community.
landingPage.goalStayConnected: Help each other grow and stay connected
